title: Please unban me
body: I'm so sorry for my behavior i have made today. It was very childish and i should't have said what i said in all chat. This is very important to me because i spent all my savings on this game. Im so sorry for what i have done and it wont happen ever again. LTLeeOCS

replies.body: If you'd like to appeal your ban, your best bet is submitting a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Then you wait two years like Tyler1, and probably get banned again.
Tyler1 didn't get any of his accounts back, he is just not ban on sight anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Lee2190,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0VfKfGY9,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-07T03:52:22.449+0000)
>
> I&#039;m so sorry for my behavior i have made today. It was very childish and i should&#039;t have said what i said in all chat. This is very important to me because i spent all my savings on this game. Im so sorry for what i have done and it wont happen ever again. LTLeeOCS

you probably got a 14-day ban before and that was your warning...
You Toxic boy. So Toxic you got banned, which means no unban if permabanned.
